parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: If true and the appropriate sheet format anchor point exists, then insert the table at the anchor point; if false, then use the values specified for the X and Y arguments as the insertion point

parameters.name: IncludeAnnotations
parameters.description: True to include weld symbols not attached to cosmetic weld features, false to not

parameters.name: CombineSameType
parameters.description: True to group welds having the same weld symbol and weld size, false to not

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate in meters for the placement of the weld table; valid only if UseAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate in meters for the placement of the weld table; valid only if UseAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBomConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Name of the part configuration for which to insert the weld table

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

title: IView.InsertWeldTable
description: Inserts a weld table into this drawing view.
signature:
System.Boolean InsertWeldTable( 
   System.Boolean
UseAnchorPoint
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeAnnotations
,
   System.Boolean
CombineSameType
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Int32
AnchorType
,
   System.String
Configuration
,
   System.String
TableTemplate
)

parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: If true and the appropriate sheet format anchor point exists, then insert the table at the anchor point; if false, then use the values specified for the X and Y arguments as the insertion point

parameters.name: IncludeAnnotations
parameters.description: True to include weld symbols not attached to cosmetic weld features, false to not

parameters.name: CombineSameType
parameters.description: True to group welds having the same weld symbol and weld size, false to not

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate in meters for the placement of the weld table; valid only if UseAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate in meters for the placement of the weld table; valid only if UseAnchorPoint = False

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBomConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Name of the part configuration for which to insert the weld table

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
The weld table template installed with SOLIDWORKS is <
SOLIDWORKS_
install_dir
>\
lang
\<
language
>\
weldtable-standard.sldwldtbt
.
